news.title: Big Food gets leaner with divestitures and breakups as consumers turn away from packaged snacks

news.title: Epstein files show Elon Musk apparently discussed plans to visit sex offender's island, host him at SpaceX
news.summary: Elon Musk corresponded with Jeffrey Epstein in 2012 and 2013, according to newly released files. Musk sought to visit Epstein's island and host him at SpaceX.

news.title: Is 'America First' starting to backfire as Washington's allies go it alone?
news.summary: Trump's volatility and unpredictability, as well as tariffs and territorial threats, have spooked erstwhile allies. Trump's unpredictability has spooked some of America's closest allies.

news.title: These overlooked stocks are a backdoor way to play the AI chip boom
news.summary: Entegris and Qnity benefit from both the AI frenzy and a broader chip-sector recovery. The materials suppliers aren’t household names, but they benefit from the chip- sector recovery.
